name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a malicious script leading to data exfiltration.

action--fa9b7d11-a2d5-4698-b1cb-591e9325.name: Kill malicious script process
action--fa9b7d11-a2d5-4698-b1cb-591e9325.description: Terminate the malicious script that is currently running.

action--a9f7ecb0-ec02-47e4-91e3-d9a23183.name: Quarantine affected files
action--a9f7ecb0-ec02-47e4-91e3-d9a23183.description: Move files that may have been affected by the malicious script to quarantine.

if-condition--bc64e3c1-d379-4676-bc14-d7.name: Check if files exist for quarantine

action--c5de0cea-95e5-4e6a-a8b3-e8a1f3b2.name: Perform system scan for malicious artifacts
action--c5de0cea-95e5-4e6a-a8b3-e8a1f3b2.description: Scan the system for any remaining malicious artifacts.

while-condition--loop-until-clean.name: Check scan results
while-condition--loop-until-clean.description: Repeat the scanning process until a clean result is achieved.

action--bd64e3c1-d379-4676-bc14-d75e0b9a.name: Block external IP
action--bd64e3c1-d379-4676-bc14-d75e0b9a.description: Block any established connections to suspicious external IPs.

action--e8fa420b-6891-45bc-b3ce-24657b7d.name: Update threat intelligence feeds
action--e8fa420b-6891-45bc-b3ce-24657b7d.description: Update the threat intelligence feeds from external sources.
